name: Heroes of Aether War
description:
A war is raging between humans and Aether elementals. It is up to you to stop them from exterminating all humans. Your mission: upgrade your armor and arm yourself to prepare to fight the Aether Warlords. Only you can save humanity.

Fight your way in the forest and in the caves. Use your power suit to help you glide, sprint, air dash,  jet pack, and wall climb to avoid obstacles. Upgrade your weapon for additional traversal - Create Ice platforms, shoot wind gusts, and burn obstacles!

Keyboard Controls:

Space = Jump (jump in air), Glide (in air)
A = Left
D = Right
F = Dash (can be used in air)
Mouse = Aim
Mouse 1 = Shoot/Attack
Mouse 2 or Q = Jet pack (hold)
Left Ctrl = Sprint/Run (hold)
T = Switch Weapon
I = Inventory
Tab = Switch Aim view (Mouse/Analog 1/Analog 2)

This game is an episodic series work in progress. Please leave some valuable comments and feedback. We want to make this game the best we can for your enjoyment!
